Class CaretakerImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.memento.CaretakerImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the object whose state is saved in the memento.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Caretaker<T>
@Component public class CaretakerImpl<T> extends Object implements Caretaker<T>
Implementation of the Caretaker interface for managing a list of mementos in the Memento design pattern. This class stores a list of mementos, maintains the current memento index, and provides methods for adding, retrieving, and navigating mementos.

  • Method Details

    • addMemento

      public void addMemento(Memento<T> memento)
      Adds a new memento to the list. If there are future mementos (after an undo), they are cleared before adding the new memento.
      Specified by:
      addMemento in interface Caretaker<T>
      Parameters:
      memento - the memento to be added. Must not be null.

    • getMemento

      public Memento<T> getMemento(int index)
      Retrieves the memento stored at the specified index.
      Specified by:
      getMemento in interface Caretaker<T>
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the memento to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the memento at the specified index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid.

    • isFirstMemento

      public boolean isFirstMemento()
      Checks if the current memento is the first in the list.
      Returns:
      true if the current memento is the first; false otherwise.

    • isLastMemento

      public boolean isLastMemento()
      Checks if the current memento is the last in the list.
      Returns:
      true if the current memento is the last; false otherwise.

    • getLastMementoIndex

      public int getLastMementoIndex()
      Returns the index of the last memento in the list.
      Returns:
      the index of the last memento.

    • getCurrentMementoIndex

      public int getCurrentMementoIndex()
      Returns the index of the current memento.
      Returns:
      the current memento index.

    • setMementoIndex

      public void setMementoIndex(int mementoIndex)
      Sets the current memento index to a specified value.
      Parameters:
      mementoIndex - the index to set.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid.

    • incrementMementoIndex

      public void incrementMementoIndex()
      Increments the current memento index to the next value.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if incrementing exceeds the maximum index.

    • decrementMementoIndex

      public void decrementMementoIndex()
      Decrements the current memento index to the previous value.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if decrementing results in an index less than zero.
